Scouring Strike.name: Scouring Strike
Scouring Strike.fullText:
Zephyr Warchief Attack 11Scouring Strike

You charge your foe with incredible speed, scouring its flesh with your weapon and spinning it around so your allies can rush into position.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Target: One creature

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. You and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 103.
Scouring Strike.flavor: You charge your foe with incredible speed, scouring its flesh with your weapon and spinning it around so your allies can rush into position.
Scouring Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. You and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free action.
Scouring Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

One Thousand Cuts.name: One Thousand Cuts
One Thousand Cuts.fullText:
Zephyr Warchief Attack 20One Thousand Cuts

You and your allies assault your foe with attacks from all sides like the full force of the brutal desert wind, giving it no respite from its wounds.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). While the target is affected by this ongoing damage, the first time you or an ally damages the target each round, it takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Miss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 103.
One Thousand Cuts.flavor: You and your allies assault your foe with attacks from all sides like the full force of the brutal desert wind, giving it no respite from its wounds.
One Thousand Cuts.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). While the target is affected by this ongoing damage, the first time you or an ally damages the target each round, it takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of its next turn.
One Thousand Cuts.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
One Thousand Cuts.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Desert Glide.name: Desert Glide
Desert Glide.fullText:
Zephyr Warchief Utility 12Desert Glide

You and your allies glide across the battlefield like sand snakes in the dunes.

Encounter        Martial
Move Action      Close burst 3

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target can move his or her speed + 2 as a free action.


Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 103.
Desert Glide.flavor: You and your allies glide across the battlefield like sand snakes in the dunes.
Desert Glide.target: You and each ally in the burst
Desert Glide.effect: Each target can move his or her speed + 2 as a free action.
